message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper proposes a deep learning approach for short-term passenger demand forecasting in an on-demand ride service platform. The approach involves the fusion of convolutional techniques and LSTM network to capture spatio-temporal characteristics and correlations of explanatory variables. The paper also employs feature selection using a tailored spatially aggregated random forest. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as they deal with deep learning, feature selection, and machine learning algorithms. The paper also involves spatial and temporal dependencies, which makes cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) likely sub-categories.
